sentences.en: Conserve your energy, you'll need it!
sentences.cn: 保存你的精力, 你会用得着的!

sentences.en: Dim little men try to conserve.
sentences.cn: 那些浑浑噩噩的小人物试图明哲保身.

sentences.en: Efforts to conserve the environment sometimes clash with the advancement of technology.
sentences.cn: 致力环境保护有时和发展技术相矛盾.

sentences.en: He killed the engine to conserve fuel.
sentences.cn: 为了节油,他关掉了马达.

sentences.en: He thought of riding a camel to conserve his strength and stave off hunger.
sentences.cn: 想到这里,他想骑上骆驼,省些力气可以多挨一会儿饥饿.

sentences.en: He writes on both sides of the sheet to conserve paper.
sentences.cn: 他在纸张的两面都写字以节省用纸.

sentences.en: Some experts have speculated that sleep may be an evolutionary mechanism to conserve energy.
sentences.cn: 一些科学家猜测,睡眠可能是保存能量的一种转化机制.

sentences.en: The objective of resource management is to conserve our resources.
sentences.cn: 资源管理的目的就在于保护好我们的资源.

sentences.en: The republic's factories have closed for the weekend to conserve energy.
sentences.cn: 为了节约能源，该共和国的工厂周末不开工。

sentences.en: The took extreme measures to conserve fuel.
sentences.cn: 他们采取极端的手段节约燃料.

sentences.en: These reactions can conserve three of every four carbons diverted to glycolate by forming triose.
sentences.cn: 这些反应能把四分之三的乙醇酸的碳保存在三碳糖中.

sentences.en: They had to conserve the candles now with winter upon them.
sentences.cn: 冬天眼看就要到了，他们不得不把蜡烛省着用。

sentences.en: We must conserve our woodlands for future generations.
sentences.cn: 我们必须为子孙后代保护林地。

sentences.en: We should conserve oil and gas by making full use of other energy sources.
sentences.cn: 我们应该通过充分利用其他能源来节省石油和天然气。

sentences.en: We turned the bicycle lights off to conserve the batteries.
sentences.cn: 我们把自行车的灯关了,以节省电池的用电.

sentences.en: Whoever was in command for the landing should conserve his energies.
sentences.cn: 谁指挥着陆,谁就会养精蓄锐,这完全是合乎情理的.

words.tran_cn: 保存；将…做成蜜饯；使守恒

trans.tran_en: fruit that is preserved by being cooked with sugar
to protect something and prevent it from changing or being damaged

trans.tran_cn: 保护， 保藏， 保存
trans.tran_en: to protect something and prevent it from changing or being damaged
